Name: Armed to the Teeth
Description: Obtain Curtana, a Holy Shield, a pair of Sphairai, a Bravura, Gae Bolg, the Artemis Bow, Thyrus, a Stardust Rod, the Veil of Wiyu, and a copy of the Omnilex in the quest "A Relic Reborn."
